forecaster.forecast.saving module¶

Provides a SavingForecast class for use by Forecast.

class forecaster.forecast.saving.SavingForecast(initial_year, retirement_accounts, debt_accounts, transaction_strategy)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.forecast.subforecast.SubForecast

A forecast of each year’s contributions to various accounts.

Parameters

  • initial_year (int) – The first year of the forecast.

  • retirement_accounts (Iterable[Account]) – Retirement savings accounts to be contributed to.

  • debt_accounts (Iterable[Debt]) – Debt accounts to be repaid.

  • transaction_strategy (TransactionStrategy) – A callable object that determines the contributions to each of the plannees’ accounts for the year. See the documentation for TransactionStrategy for acceptable args when calling this object.

account_transactions¶

The allocation of transactions to accounts determined by transaction_strategy for the current year.

Type

dict[Account, dict[Decimal, Money]]

debt_repayment¶

The amount contributed to debts.

Type

Money

retirement_savings¶

The amount contributed to retirement savings accounts.

Type

Money

total¶

The amount contributed to all accounts.

Type

Money

__call__(available)[source]¶

Records transactions against accounts; mutates available.

__init__(initial_year, retirement_accounts, debt_accounts, transaction_strategy)[source]¶

Initializes an instance of SavingForecast.

property debt_repayment

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property debt_repayment_history¶

Record of debt_repayment over all past years.

property retirement_savings

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property retirement_savings_history¶

Record of retirement_savings over all past years.

property total

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property total_history¶

Record of total over all past years.

property transactions_history¶

Record of transactions over all past years.
